titles.title: America Stands with Israel Act
To provide defense and security assistance to ensure the survival of Israel and its people from an existing or imminent military threat, and for other purposes.
America Stands with Israel Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
America Stands with Israel Act
This bill authorizes the President to introduce U.S. Armed Forces into hostilities or to direct immediate transfer of defense articles or services to ensure the survival of Israel and its people from an existing or imminent threat.
